reasoning.selected_because: Coordinate geometry with points and lines on a grid
reasoning.content_analysis: Plot points A(2,3), B(5,1) and draw line segment AB on coordinate grid
reasoning.decision_rule_applied: Rule 3: Coordinate geometry with specific points -> JSXGRAPH
reasoning.alternatives_rejected: DESMOS for functions, GEOGEBRA for pure geometry without coords
reasoning.summary: Coordinate grid with plotted points demonstrates coordinate concepts

classifications.visualization_focus: Coordinate grid with points A(2,3) and B(5,1) connected by line segment

diagram_specs.educational_purpose: Understanding coordinate plotting and distance/midpoint concepts

_fixture_metadata.description: Basic coordinate geometry with two points and line segment
common_issues_to_check: CRITICAL: Boundingbox order is [xmin, ymax, xmax, ymin] NOT [xmin,ymin,xmax,ymax]
Points should be visible and labeled
Grid should be enabled for coordinate reading
